```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE, 
  eval = TRUE,
  cache = FALSE,
  dpi = 300,
  fig.width = 150 / 25.4,
  fig.height = 100 / 25.4,
  warning = TRUE,
  error = TRUE,
  message = TRUE
)
library(ggplot2)
library(INBOtheme)
theme_set(
  theme_inbo(
    base_family = "Flanders Art Sans", # "Calibri",
    base_size = 12
  )
)
if (!interactive() && opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") != "html") {
  opts_chunk$set(dev = "cairo_pdf")
  theme_set(
    theme_inbo(
      base_family = "Flanders Art Sans", # "Calibri",
      base_size = 8
    )
  )
}
library(DT)
```
